item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: August 28, 2024 Today's Verse 1 John 4:10â€“11 [10] In this is love, not that we have loved God but that he loved us and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins. [11] Beloved, if God so loved us, we also ought to love one another. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known? Have you not heard? The Lord is the everlasting God, the Creator of the ends of the earth.
